object

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • object.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends Object
    Holds and manages all the data required for this program.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Phil Adriaan

      • createOrderTable

        private void createOrderTable()
                       throws IOException
        Create the table for the orders if the appropriate order file is not available. Applicable for when the new fiscal year starts, or the order file is deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - For reading and writing errors.

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
             throws IOException
        Refreshes the screen and update the tables to give the users the most up to date information on the data.
        Throws:
        IOException - For reading and writing errors.

        Inner joins 2 Table and adds the selected column to the resulting data.
        Parameters:
        table_1 - First Table.
        table_2 - Second Table.
        key_1 - Key from first Table.
        key_2 - Key from second Table.
        the_selection - Selected column from second Table.
